des:
This skill works with your Automate Pulse 2 and Automate app. Once you have set up your Automate Pulse 2 and Automate App, utilize this skill to interact with your Automate shades using Alexa. Enable this skill and ask Alexa, “Alexa, discover devices.” Once discovered, quickly operate scenes, rooms or individual shades with simple voice commands.

Create scenes and rooms in the Automate app and name them what you please.

Scenes: 
To control scenes, simply tell Alexa to turn on your *Scene Name*. 
"Alexa, turn on Good Morning” 
"Alexa, turn on Movie Time” 
"Alexa, turn on Good Night” 

Rooms and individual shades: 
Simply tell Alexa set the *Shade Name* to *Chosen Percentage*. 
-"Alexa, set the Kitchen shade to 50%" 
-“Alexa, close the Living Room shade” 
-“Alexa, brighten the Bedroom shade by 25%” 

You can even control scenes in specific rooms: 
Simply tell Alexa turn on *Scene Name* in the *Room Name*. 
"Alexa, turn on Good Morning in the Kitchen” 
"Alexa, turn on Movie Time in the Lounge” 
"Alexa, turn on Good Night in the Bedroom” 

Setup is quick and easy: 
1. Connect the Automate Pulse 2 mobile app with your Automate motorized Shades

2. Create custom scenes and rooms, naming them what you please in the Automate Pulse 2 App. 

3. Link your "Automate Shades V2" skill with your Automate Pulse account. 

4. Ask Alexa to discover devices and scenes. 

Experience smarter shades with Automate Shades V2 skill for Amazon Alexa
